rukus.text: 82|5|tetiya pratyeke'i janiba, si ki agalai pathiya'iche arau pichata ki raakhi ahiche.
82|6|He manara! Kihe tomaka tomara pratipalaka samparke bibhraanta karaiche
82|7|yijane tomaka srsti karaiche, tara pichata tomaka suthama karaiche arau susamanjasya karaiche
82|8|arau yi akrtita bicaraiche, te'om tomaka (se'i akrtite) gathana karaiche.
82|9|Ketiya'o nahaya, baram tomaloke pratidana dirasaka asbikara karaa
82|10|arau niscaya tomalokara oparata niyojita ache samraksakadala
82|16|arau sihamte tara paraa anupasthita thakiba noraaraiba.
82|17|Arau tomaka kihe janaba ye, pratidana dirasa ki
82|18|akau kaicho, kihe tomaka janaba pratidana dirasa ki
82|19|se'idina kone'o karao babe eko karaara ksamata naraakhiba; arau se'idina sakalo bisayara kartrtba ha’ba allahara.
